name: Disorder of Operations
description:
Push dice blocks to solve math puzzles in Disorder of Operations, and conquer its head-scratching underworld!

This game was created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. The theme was "roll of the dice".

Controls
  • WASD / Arrow keys: Move
  • Z: Undo previous move
  • R: Reset level
  • Esc: Pause
